description: This file is a server-side entry point for a Remix application, handling HTTP requests and rendering server responses with streaming support, including bot detection and CORS headers.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, detects bots, and delegates to specific request handling functions.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from bots, streaming the server-rendered React app.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers, streaming the server-rendered React app.
